title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’) with model switching, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers fluent builder APIs and reactive wrappers.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem to converse with Ollama from Rails or plain Ruby apps.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Lightweight CLI wrapper around ollama-js for quick prompts and model pulls from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and embedding pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function-calling, GPU offloading, Docker Compose stacks, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) plus Compose examples for development and production.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat over your documents.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Python Discord.py bot that exposes Ollama chat and image-generation endpoints in servers.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI micro-service template that adds JWT auth, rate-limiting, and OpenAI-compatible endpoints atop Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Bolt-js Slack bot that brings local LLM power into channels with thread support and model selection.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, and perform Q&A using an Ollama backend.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama with async HTTP and native JSON handling.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app that exposes Ollama chat & embeddings via Django REST endpoints with admin UI.
